1.0.name: wordpress/callback-request
1.0.description:
Callback Request was created to allow for a quick and easy way to add a call back request form to your website using a simple shortcode.

The form asks for the following details for the user:

- Name
- Phone Number
- Most suitable time for callback

Once the user fills in the form and clicks on the request callback button an email will be sent to your email address showing you the details of the request. By doing this it allows you to quickly add this task as a reminder to your phone or email client so you can easily get in touch with your prospective client at a time that suits them.

Along with the front end form there is a small backend configuration which allows you to set the following information:

- The email address to send reminders from.
- Your email address to send the reminders to.
- The email subject.

The backend also gives you some simple styling information to allow you to set the colours
